name: I Want That Ship (V)
Lore: 'Like nerf herders herding nerfs, Imperial commanders often use TIE fighters to drive fleeing Rebel ships into tractor beam range.',
Text: 'Deploy on your battleground. Once per battle, if opponent''s card is hit by a non-[Permanent Weapon] weapon, may make opponent''s total power -4 (-2 if hit by a lightsaber).',
